job_tasks.phrase: contributing significantly to the development of impactful and responsible user-centered products and services.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the goal of developing products and services, aligning technical work with user needs and business impact, which falls under understanding business context and strategic goals.
This directly relates to the design and management of data structures and flows specifically for GenAI, fitting the definition of data engineering for AI.

job_tasks.phrase: having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions knowledge of GenAI algorithms and applying AI/ML techniques to solve business problems, which is the core of model development and application.
Testing AI solutions, especially GenAI, is a crucial part of the model development lifecycle to ensure performance and correctness.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding business problems and designing AI solutions to address them, aligning with business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Use visualization tools/modules to be able to explore and analyze outcomes & for Model validation eg: using Power BI / Tableau
job_tasks.justification: Exploring and analyzing outcomes, and model validation using visualization tools, are part of assessing and managing the data and model performance, fitting under data engineering and management.

job_tasks.phrase: Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment
job_tasks.justification: Building CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment is a direct MLOps task, focused on the operationalization of models.

soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly indicates a need for adaptability and comfort with ambiguous or evolving situations, a key aspect of learning and adaptability.
This is an explicit mention of a communication skill.

soft_skills.phrase: showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase describes the ability to handle complex, open-ended problems with both analytical (rigor) and innovative (creativity) approaches, fitting the problem-solving and pragmatism category.

profile.rationale: The job ad clearly outlines a blend of core software engineering tasks (CI/CD pipelines for ML deployment) and GenAI specialization tasks (formulating GenAI data architecture, using GenAI algorithms, testing GenAI solutions, designing GenAI use cases). The emphasis is on applying AI/ML techniques to solve business problems within a GenAI context, and the mention of CI/CD indicates an integration and operational aspect. The soft skills also support a role that requires both technical depth and strategic thinking. This balance points towards a Core GenAI Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear in its description of responsibilities and required skills, directly mapping to several categories within the coding book. The tasks are specific enough to confidently assign a profile.
